snippet: Salafists in Yemen have formed their first political party, urging the new president, Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi, to apply Islamic law to all areas of life and to reject interference by foreign powers.
lead_paragraph: Salafists in Yemen have formed their first political party, urging the new president, Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi, to apply Islamic law to all areas of life and to reject interference by foreign powers.
